implementation of IPythVRF for testing and development This contract automatically fulfills VRF requests and calls back to the requester","kind":"dev","methods":{"fulfillRandomness(bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"Mission X: Push-based callback - VRF provider calls this on game contracts This is implemented in game contracts, not in VRF provider But we need it in interface, so we provide empty implementation here"},"getRandomness(bytes32)":{"details":"Get random number for a given request"},"requestRandomness()":{"details":"Request verifiable random number (auto-fulfilled for mock) Mission X: No seed - VRF generates its own entropy Automatically calls back to the requester contract's fulfillRandomness function"},"verifyRandomness(bytes32,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Verify randomness proof (always returns true for mock)"}},"title":"MockPythVRF","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/MockPythVRF.sol":"MockPythVRF"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"contracts/MockPythVRF.sol":{"keccak256":"0x36fdac8b8d20cfc1358a049265f562d83d134ef7b538376c32a501357cf39269","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8b52fee62de6513b0351868b01d62b8d1033b156cbe59c155a130ebf8de1ceb8","dweb:/ipfs/QmW74T6mbGDZeCsYsozYcmzaFmotNpSczMUTGybE2tKauS"]},"contracts/interfaces/IPythVRF.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdcbc521fe5a145715da197f75979fe0abf6e3eb2fe40c456aa2b35758154a1d8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://4b4e95123e15dec700dce8ff0624f3e61d4ec473ab0b5afad48aef3693691c60","dweb:/ipfs/QmYNvRDbCBSu3KdLTZTnAyVPbS1wPULtnkoqp6zaJhbkpx"]}},"version":1}
